CACHE Enumerated Data Types
CACHE

Cache wait flags

typedef uint32_t CACHE_Wait
 
#define CACHE_NOWAIT   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 No blocking, the call exits after programmation of the control registers.
 
#define CACHE_WAIT   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 Blocking Call, the call exits after the relevant cache status registers indicate completion. For block coherence this waits on the Word count register to be come 0 along with invalidating the prefetch buffer.
 
#define CACHE_FENCE_WAIT   ((uint32_t) 2U)
 Blocking Call, For block coherence this uses the MFENCE to wait for completion, along with invalidating the prefetch buffer.
 
#define CACHE_ONLY_WAIT   ((uint32_t) 3U)
 Blocking Call, the call exits after the relevant cache status registers indicate completion. For block coherence this waits on the Word count register to be come 0.
 
#define CACHE_FENCE_ONLY_WAIT   ((uint32_t) 4U)
 Blocking Call, For block coherence this uses the MFENCE only to wait for completion.
 

L1 (P or D) Sizes

typedef uint32_t CACHE_L1Size
 
#define CACHE_L1_0KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 No Cache.
 
#define CACHE_L1_4KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 4KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_L1_8KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 2U)
 8KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_L1_16KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 3U)
 16KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_L1_32KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 4U)
 32KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_L1_MAXIM1   ((uint32_t) 5U)
 MAX Cache Size.
 
#define CACHE_L1_MAXIM2   ((uint32_t) 6U)
 MAX Cache Size.
 
#define CACHE_L1_MAXIM3   ((uint32_t) 7U)
 MAX Cache Size.
 

L2 Sizes

For devices that have maximum caches less than the defined values, setting a higher value will map to maximum cache

typedef uint32_t CACHE_L2Size
 
#define CACHE_0KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 0U)
 No Cache.
 
#define CACHE_32KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 1U)
 32KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_64KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 2U)
 64KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_128KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 3U)
 128KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_256KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 4U)
 256KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_512KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 5U)
 512KB Cache
 
#define CACHE_1024KCACHE   ((uint32_t) 6U)
 1024KB Cache
